personal.name: Ersel Metz Magbanua
personal.bio: Web developer specializing in frontend and backend development

aboutMe.paragraph1: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a dedicated web developer with a passion for creating innovative web solutions. I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications using modern technologies.
aboutMe.paragraph2: With experience in both frontend and backend development, I bring a comprehensive understanding of the web development process. My expertise includes creating dynamic user interfaces, developing robust server-side applications, and ensuring seamless user experiences across all devices.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I'm always eager to take on new challenges and collaborate on exciting projects. Whether it's developing a new web application from scratch or enhancing existing systems, I approach every project with attention to detail and a commitment to excellence.

education.institution: Renaissance School of Science and Technology
education.description: Relevant coursework: Web Development, Database Management, Software Engineering, Object-Oriented Programming

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive web applications using PHP, JavaScript, and modern frameworks
responsibilities: Developed responsive web applications using PHP, JavaScript, and modern frameworks

Maintained and optimized existing codebases for better performance
Worked with databases to design and implement data structures
